error.general_error_description: Something went wrong! Please try again later.
error.general_error_not_loaded: Did not load correctly, please try again later.
error.general_error_only_letters: You can only enter letters in this field.
error.general_error_only_number: You can only enter numbers in this field.
error.general_error_minimun_age: You do not meet the minimum age requirement.
error.general_error_image_type: The image must be of type .jpg, .jpeg, .png.
error.general_error_logged: You are logged in. You cannot access the requested screen.
error.general_error_not_logged: You are not logged in. You cannot access the requested screen.
error.general_error_upload: The image was not uploaded correctly. Please try again later.
error.email_structure_error: The email does not follow a proper structure. Example: hello@talk2gether.com.
error.register_error: Registration was not possible. Please try again later.
error.recover_password_error: Unable to send recovery email. Please try again later.
error.general_error_min_max_age: Minimum age cannot exceed maximum age
error.general_error_min_max_age_required: Enter minimum and maximum age or leave the field empty
error.general_error_null_video_call: The room you are trying to join does not exist
error.general_error_no_call: No one joined the meeting or the meeting was never created. It cannot be rated.
error.general_error_user_not_qualify: The user could not be rated.

first_container.title: Learn languages with Talk2gether
first_container.description: Connect with people from all over the world and learn their language and culture

second_container.title: Learn a new language
second_container.description: Practice speaking with native speakers and improve your linguistic skills through real-time conversations

third_container.title: Expand your cultural knowledge
third_container.description: Experience different cultures and gain insights into their customs, traditions, and way of life.

register_page.register_description: Tell us a bit about yourself*
register_page.register_description_placeholder: Describe yourself and what you like to do...
register_page.register_terms: I accept the terms and conditions*
register_page.register_language_level_title: How to choose the language level?
register_page.register_language_level_first_descriptio: Choose the Beginner level if you are just starting with the language. You might not speak a single word, or you might know some basic things. If you are familiar with the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages, this corresponds to levels A1 and A2.
register_page.register_language_level_second_descripti: Choose the Intermediate level if you speak the language with basic confidence. You can make plans with others, talk about your travels, and describe a movie. If you are familiar with the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages, this corresponds to level B1.
register_page.register_language_level_third_descriptio: Choose the Advanced level if you feel very confident speaking the language. You can have fluent conversations with native speakers and use the language effectively for work and study. If you are familiar with the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages, this corresponds to level B2 and above.

terms_and_conditions_I.terms_and_conditions_I_description: The following terms and conditions set forth the rights and obligations of users when using the Talk2gether platform, a web system designed to improve and expand linguistic skills in various languages through interaction with native speakers and students via video calls or chat. By accessing and using the platform, the user agrees to comply with the following terms and conditions. It is important to read this document carefully before using Talk2gether.

terms_and_conditions_II.terms_and_conditions_II_subtitle_1: 1. Improvement and Expansion of Linguistic Skills
terms_and_conditions_II.terms_and_conditions_II_description_1: Talk2gether's primary objective is to provide users with an online environment where they can improve and expand their skills in a specific language. This is achieved through interaction with native speakers and students, who will provide opportunities to practice the language via video calls or chat.
terms_and_conditions_II.terms_and_conditions_II_description_2: The Talk2gether platform is committed to offering users a stable communication space with an intuitive and easy-to-navigate interface. The goal is to provide a smooth and enjoyable experience for users, thus encouraging their participation and continued use of the platform.
terms_and_conditions_II.terms_and_conditions_II_description_3: The platform offers relevant statistics for each user, allowing them to analyze and track their progress in language learning. These statistics include information on study time, achieved fluency level, improved linguistic skills, and other relevant indicators.
terms_and_conditions_II.terms_and_conditions_II_subtitle_4: 4. Generation of Reports for Decision Making
terms_and_conditions_II.terms_and_conditions_II_description_4: Talk2gether generates reports that contain important indicators for decision making. These reports provide valuable information on user performance, the quality of interactions, and other relevant data that can be used to improve the platform and personalize each user's learning experience.

terms_and_conditions_III.terms_and_conditions_III_description_1: To use Talk2gether, the user must register and create a personal account. It is the user's responsibility to provide accurate and up-to-date information during the registration process. The user will be solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials and for all activities that occur under their account.
terms_and_conditions_III.terms_and_conditions_III_description_2: The user agrees to use Talk2gether in accordance with the purposes set forth in these terms and conditions. The use of the platform for any illegal, fraudulent, defamatory, offensive, or third-party rights-violating activities is prohibited. The user agrees not to use the platform to send inappropriate or unrelated content to language learning.
terms_and_conditions_III.terms_and_conditions_III_description_3: The user agrees to maintain respectful and proper behavior during interactions with other Talk2gether users. Any form of harassment, discrimination, insult, or offensive behavior is prohibited. The user agrees to be responsible for their conduct and commits to not damage the reputation of the platform or other users.
terms_and_conditions_III.terms_and_conditions_III_description_4: Talk2gether is committed to protecting users' privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws and regulations. The platform will collect and use user information solely for purposes related to the operation of the platform and the improvement of the user experience. Full details on data collection, use, and protection are described in the Talk2gether Privacy Policy.

terms_and_conditions_IV.terms_and_conditions_IV_description_1: Talk2gether will strive to maintain the availability and proper functioning of the platform. However, there is no guarantee that the platform will be free from interruptions, errors, or defects. Talk2gether will not be responsible for any loss or damage caused by the lack of availability or malfunctioning of the platform.
terms_and_conditions_IV.terms_and_conditions_IV_description_2: The platform allows users to generate content, such as chat messages or video call interactions. Talk2gether is not responsible for user-generated content and does not assume any responsibility for users' opinions, statements, or behaviors. Each user is solely responsible for their content and must comply with applicable laws and regulations.
terms_and_conditions_IV.terms_and_conditions_IV_description_3: Talk2gether provides tools and opportunities to improve and expand linguistic skills but does not guarantee specific results in language learning. The user is responsible for their own learning process and for using the platform effectively to achieve their goals.

terms_and_conditions_V.terms_and_conditions_V_subtitle_1: 1. Modifications to the Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions_V.terms_and_conditions_V_description_1: Talk2gether reserves the right to make modifications to these terms and conditions at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes through the platform or by email. Continued use of Talk2gether after notification constitutes acceptance of the new terms and conditions.
terms_and_conditions_V.terms_and_conditions_V_description_2: Talk2gether may, at its discretion, terminate or suspend a user's account in case of violation of these terms and conditions or for any other justified reason. In case of termination, the user will lose access to the platform and any content or data associated with their account.

terms_and_conditions_VI.terms_and_conditions_VI_description_1: By using Talk2gether, the user acknowledges having read, understood, and accepted these terms and conditions in their entirety.
